channel.title: Theiving
channel.description: So on my server, my thieving works perfect, with the exception of H.A.M members, when i try pickpocketing them, no matter how many times i try, i'm always caught, and i can't seem to find any differences between them and any other npc that i can theive from, if you have any ideas why this is happening, please respond.
